Description=Run BTC service behind HAProxy
Requires=docker.service
After=docker.service
After=install-docker-compose.service

[Service]
WorkingDirectory=/bitcoind
Restart=always

# Set Environment Variables
EnvironmentFile=/etc/environment

# Stop
# Compose down, remove containers and volumes
ExecStop=/opt/bin/docker-compose -f /bitcoind/docker-compose.yaml down -v

ExecStopStop=/opt/bin/docker-compose -f /bitcoind/docker-compose.yaml rm -v

# Start
# Compose up
ExecStart=/opt/bin/docker-compose -f /bitcoind/docker-compose.yaml up -d

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target","enabled":true,"name":"btc.service"},{"contents":"[Unit]
